Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Raphael:

Text.Language: Marenouwst m~Viwt nem Ps/ri: nem Pip~neuma eyouab: n~tentaio~ n~Rava/l: pimahsomt n~ar,/aggeloc.
Let us worship the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit, and honor Raphael, the third archangel.
